name: Tachyon Technologies
description: Founded in 2012, Tachyon Technologies was created to address the growing need for technology that enables businesses to be mobile and flexible in managing their applications and employees. As the market began transitioning into the Digital Era, Tachyon realized that companies needed specific skill sets of technology expertise to provide their customers with new tools and services, create better ways for their employees to do their jobs, and do so in a modern, cost-effective way.

locations.address: Plot No. 35 Huda Layout, Nandagiri Hills Road No. 70, Jubilee Hills
